item.description:
Sorry about the last minute changes. It's too darn crappy out to hike. I don't mind hiking in the snow but a cold rain just plain stinks. So stay warm inside at the New World Tavern with Bill C. There are 3 bands playing and they have always been great bands when I went.

I hope you can make it - study Bill's picture - It's a good representation...

- R
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Bill at the Front Bar

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Full Moon Beer Fest with Bill
